title: Luxury house for sale in Nugegoda Mirihana
details:
Luxury house for sale in Nugegoda Mirihana
2km from Mirihana police
2.4km from Nugegoda super market

10.9 perches
6 bedrooms 4 bathrooms
2units separate
Roof fully wood finish
Lovely pantry
Dinning and large hall
Large balcony front
Garden space
Roller shutter gate with 2 parking
Separate maid’s room and bathroom

Photos can be sent only for interested parties
If interested fix an appointment for inspection

NO BROKERS
Price 25 mil (nego)
Call or whatsapp – 0772805053
